Description: Ensures that each customer_id in tsb.customer_data_bank is unique, validating the integrity of the primary key constraint.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) AS duplicates

Description: Checks that there are no NULL values in the customer_id column, ensuring every record has a unique identifier as required by the primary key constraint.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_id IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the full_name column, which may impact customer identification and communication.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE full_name IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the date_of_birth column, which may affect age calculations and compliance requirements.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the gender column, which may impact demographic analysis and reporting.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the address column, which may affect customer contact and verification processes.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE address IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the phone_number column, which may hinder customer communication and verification.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the email_address column, which may impact digital communication with customers.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the national_id_or_passport_number column, which may affect identity verification and regulatory compliance.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the occupation column, which may impact customer profiling and risk assessment.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE occupation IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the customer_type column, which may affect segmentation and service eligibility.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_type IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the account_numbers column, which may indicate incomplete customer records.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE account_numbers IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the age column, which may impact demographic analysis and eligibility checks.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the created_by column, which may affect audit trails and accountability.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_by IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the created_on column, which may impact record creation tracking and auditing.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the modified_by column, which may affect tracking of record modifications.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_by IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the modified_on column, which may impact tracking of record updates.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_on IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the status column, which may affect customer lifecycle management and reporting.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NULL

Description: Checks that email_address values conform to a standard email format, ensuring contact information is usable.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL AND email_address !~* '^[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\\.[A-Za-z]{2,}$'

Description: Checks that phone_number values contain only valid characters (digits, spaces, plus, hyphens), ensuring contact numbers are correctly formatted.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND phone_number !~* '^[0-9+\\- ]+$'

Description: Checks that gender values are within expected domain (e.g., Male, Female, Other), ensuring standardized demographic data.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NOT NULL AND gender NOT IN ('Male','Female','Other')

Description: Checks that status values are within expected domain (e.g., Active, Inactive, Suspended), ensuring accurate customer lifecycle tracking.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NOT NULL AND status NOT IN ('Active','Inactive','Suspended')

Description: Checks that age values are positive integers, ensuring demographic data is logical.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NOT NULL AND age < 0

Description: Checks that date_of_birth values are not in the future, ensuring logical birth dates.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND date_of_birth > CURRENT_DATE

Description: Checks that the age column matches the calculated age from date_of_birth, ensuring consistency between fields.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND age IS NOT NULL AND age <> EXTRACT(YEAR FROM AGE(CURRENT_DATE, date_of_birth))::int

Description: Checks for duplicate national_id_or_passport_number values, which should be unique for each customer to prevent identity duplication.
Custom_SQL: SELECT national_id_or_passport_number, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NOT NULL GROUP BY national_id_or_passport_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks for duplicate email_address values, which may indicate multiple records for the same customer.
Custom_SQL: SELECT email_address, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL GROUP BY email_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks for duplicate phone_number values, which may indicate multiple records for the same contact number.
Custom_SQL: SELECT phone_number, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL GROUP BY phone_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks that created_on timestamps are not set in the future, ensuring accurate record creation tracking.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NOT NULL AND created_on > NOW()

Description: Checks that modified_on timestamps are not earlier than created_on, ensuring logical record modification history.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_on IS NOT NULL AND created_on IS NOT NULL AND modified_on < created_on
